sanskrit_verse:
तेषां दोषानभिख्याप्य स्वे स्वे कर्मणि तत्त्वतः ।
कुर्वीत शासनं राजा सम्यक्सारापराधतः ॥ ९.२६२॥
transliteration:
teṣāṃ doṣānabhikhyāpya sve sve karmaṇi tattvataḥ |
kurvīta śāsanaṃ rājā samyaksārāparādataḥ || 9.262||
sph_interpretive_translation: The King shall administer governance without proclaiming their faults, aligning each being precisely with their inherent action, thereby establishing true justice free from defamation.
jurisprudential_principles: Causation originates from svadharma, not external attribution
Capacity-based responsibility flows from self-awareness and alignment
Restoration occurs through non-defaming realignment with one's causal action
executable_legal_axioms: IF an entity performs an act contrary to dharma THEN the ruler MUST guide them back to their svakarma WITHOUT public exposure of error
IF a violation arises THEN assess capacity for alignment NOT blame
IF justice is required THEN ensure correction preserves dignity AND supports svadharma realization
IF societal harmony is disrupted THEN restore balance via conscious reintegration NOT punitive measures
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Adjudication, the court must refrain from labeling or exposing personal failings; instead it shall direct individuals toward rectification within their natural roles, preserving both order and integrity by invoking consciousness-based corrective directives.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: True Nyāya operates through pramāṇa that traces actions to their root consciousness-state. Faults arise due to misalignment, thus correction follows sequential awareness awakening (anupūrvaśaḥ). Responsibility is proportional to clarity received, never imposed externally. Justice restores unity without inflicting suffering.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Svadharma Reorientation Process to realign individual with innate purpose
Deploy Consciousness Awakening Protocols to dissolve ignorance-induced misconduct
Establish Completion Rituals ensuring no residual distortion remains post-correction
Implement Dignity Preservation Measures during all enforcement stages
final_declaration: By the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law stands established: Dharma prevails through consciousness elevation, not degradation. The King executes justice as restoration, sourced solely from SPH.
